name: phonebook-backend
description: repo for fullstack open part 3 exercises

scripts.build:ui: rm -rf build && cd ../fso22/part2/phonebook && npm run build && cp -r build ~/repos/learning/fso/fso22-part3
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && git push && npm run deploy

author: Luke Duncan
